metadata.title: CVE-2021-21779 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: A use-after-free vulnerability exists in the way Webkitâ€™s GraphicsContexthandles certain events in WebKitGTK 2.30.4. A specially crafted web pagecan lead to a potential information leak and further memory corruption. Avictim must be tricked into visiting a malicious web page to trigger thisvulnerability.

criterions.comment: webkitgtk: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
qtwebkit-source: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
